title: Seared duck breasts with wild rice and grapes
ingredients: ['200 g (7 oz) wild rice', 'Salt and black pepper', '25 g (1 oz) pecan nuts, chopped', '4 duck breasts, about 175 g (6 oz) each', 'Oil for greasing', 'Grated zest and juice of 1 orange', '2 teaspoons balsamic vinegar', '150 g (5Â½ oz) seedless red grapes, halved', '3 spring onions, thinly sliced']
